title: Macbook pro a1502 13 shutdown During login screen
message: When turn on the mac and login with password it works fine but if not login within 2 minuets it shutdown itself. Is it hardware issue or something else? Before it was dropped from 1 feet on carpet and no backlight . fix it but now see this issue. No idea what it could be. Thanks in advance.

title: Macbook pro a1502 13 shutdown During login screen
message:
Doesn't show password screen if press trackpad click?
Do a PRAM reset and try again.
If you let it into boot menu, still goes off?

title: Macbook pro a1502 13 shutdown During login screen
message:
yes ,show password screen if press trackpad click.
Did a PRAM reset and goes off.
During  boot menu , NOT goes off.

title: Macbook pro a1502 13 shutdown During login screen
message:
"yes ,show password screen if press trackpad click."
So it doesn't turn off, just goes to standy-by...

title: Macbook pro a1502 13 shutdown During login screen
message: No, this is not stand-by, totally shutdown.  i turn  it on manually again and if i dont login within  two minuites it shutdown again.If i login, it work fine, All tested passed. Is it a big issue?

title: Macbook pro a1502 13 shutdown During login screen
message:
I get confuse now.
You told it goes to login screen again when press trackpad click...

title: Macbook pro a1502 13 shutdown During login screen
message: yes , that right it goes to login screen again when press trackpad click.. I dont have issue with login screen. Issue is if i  dont sign in within two minuites it shutdown itself. I did google and see some people have the same issue and no solution.

title: Macbook pro a1502 13 shutdown During login screen
message: So after these 2min doesn't come at login screen just clicking on trackpad; you need to press power button?

title: Macbook pro a1502 13 shutdown During login screen
message: If that's the case you're making an issue out of nothing.....this is the same on many Macs if you don't login after powering it on.....

title: Macbook pro a1502 13 shutdown During login screen
message:
That is, I just tested it now in a MacBook Pro 15" from 2010.
It goes off if no password typed.
I didn't exactly count the time, this is less important; few minutes, less than 5 for sure.
